episode_event_sub_ep_lusamine_family/660:
Hapu, who’s this guy you want me to meet up
with? Just spill it already!

Don’t be impatient, Gladion. You’ll see for yourself
soon enough.
Ah! Here he is now!
This must be Gladion.

I see what you meant, Hapu. He does have a
sharp look in his eyes.
And you are...?
Hmph.
I’m Grimsley, one of the Unova Elite Four.
Hmph.
Hmph.
Wait, that’s it?!

I had a feeling the two of you would see eye to
eye. It seems I was correct.

“Two men clad in all black stood before one
another...”

“In naught but a moment, a new friendship
was born.”

I could learn a thing or two from someone like
you, Grimsley.

You can teach me things that’ll take me to even
greater heights as a Trainer! I’ll be stronger
than ever!

And I’ll be waiting to battle you myself once you
get there.

That’s great, Gladion! I’ve never seen you look
so excited before.

Indeed! I can feel a new strength starting to
rise within him already...
I’ve got it!

Gladion, who fights with all of his might to rise
to greater heights...
We should call him Gladion the Gladiator! Haha!

G-Gladiator?! Not exactly the nickname I had
in mind...

Hmph. Give it your best shot, Gladion the
Gladiator.

We’ll make quite a formidable pair, won’t we!
Never-lily-livered Lillie and Gladion the Gladiator!
Sure... Yeah...

“The young man in black had earned a new
name for himself...”

“Yet with this new name came new troubles
as well.”
That was splendid, Lillie.
I really enjoyed battling together.
Thank you! I had a lot of fun, too!
Excellent battle, Miss Lillie.

I could tell you were giving it your absolute best.
Well done indeed!

Lillie used to be so shy and reserved, always
taking things slowly at her own pace...
Hmph. Now she’s like a totally different person.
I don’t have time to take things slowly anymore.

I became a Pokémon Trainer much later than you
and Hau did.

I want to catch up to your level as fast as I can,
so I need to train extra hard.

That’s why I try to do my very best every single
day! Like Hapu says—no one can call me
lily-livered!
Hmph. Right.

I think it’s wonderful that you’re working so hard
to improve yourself.
Wouldn’t you agree, Lady Caitlin?
Oh my gosh! Are you two feeling all right?!

Hoho, it seems your hardworking spirit must have
rubbed off on the two of them, Miss Lillie. They
look perfectly exhausted.

(These two sleepyheads seem to have grown
pretty powerful, slow pace or not... Could that
actually be the secret to their strength?!)

(I guess it would’ve been possible for Lillie to
grow stronger in a similar way, even if she’d
continued to take things slow...)

(But as her brother, I kind of like this new Lillie...
It’s good to see her working hard and doing
her best.)
This is bad news.

Ultra Beasts like this are a threat to people and
Pokémon alike.
For one to appear here on Pasio...
Well, we can’t just ignore something like this.
Wait! Don’t!
That Pheromosa isn’t a danger to anyone!

It appeared before me out of the blue one day,
and it’s been with me ever since.

We’ve formed a sync pair together. It’s been a
very friendly companion to me.
You formed a sync pair with an Ultra Beast?!

Your track record with those hasn’t exactly been
the cleanest, ma’am...
Whoa! Is that what I think it is?!

A Pheromosa! Wow! This is amazing!
It’s so beautiful!

Look at how long and graceful its body is—and
that gorgeous white coloration!
Yes! These shots are going to be fantastic!
Wait, don’t go near it! That Pokémon is—

Aw, crud. This isn’t like me... I must be gettin’
tired in my old age.
Right. I’m gonna go take a load off somewhere.
Nanu?!

The only threats I see around here are my
own preconceptions.
Nothing to worry about, right, missy?
No, sir!
Ultra Beasts are Pokémon, too, after all!

You take care of that partner of yours,
Miss President.

Will she be all right? Maybe I should go...
No, I can’t walk away now...
What are you doing over here, Lusamine?

A-Acerola! My goodness, you nearly scared me
to death!
Oh! Isn’t that Lillie over there?
Lillie!
Shh! Stop! Stop!
Phew... That was close.

Are you trying to keep an eye on her in secret
or something?

Actually, I am. Lillie is shopping for clothes with
her friends right now.
But...I’m afraid she’ll pick out something strange!
Hahaha! She’ll be fine!

Yeah! Lisia and Candice both have an amazing
sense of style. Trust me—she’s in good hands.

You’re right... As a parent, I need to learn to trust
my children more.

Hold on... It looks like someone else is
joining them.

Who is that?! And what is that skintight aqua
bodysuit she’s strutting around in?!

She looks so bold and confident... What if she
starts to rub off on Lillie? What if Lillie tries to
imitate her fashion?! Oh dear...
Umm, I’m pretty sure that’s not gonna happen...

I have to do something... I’m her mother, so it’s
my duty to step in and put a stop to this, right?

It’s not going to be easy to move on from your
past ways if you continue on like this, Lusamine...

Well, well... I didn’t think I’d run into Madam Prez
herself way out here on Pasio.
I see you made your way here as well, Guzma...
Meh. Alola was too small for us.

You sure seem to have changed a lot over
the journey...
I saw that look in your eye.

You never made a face like that when we
were on the same team. You ain’t even the
same person now.

You used to have this gleam in your eye...
Like you knew you had the power to change the
whole world right at your fingertips.
I used to wanna be like you...
But now?
You’re not wrong... I have changed.
Are you disappointed?
Nah.
What?

That face you were makin’ a minute ago...
You looked kinda like a real mom.

Your kids deserve to have this person in their
lives, not that power-hungry lady with a gleam
in her eye.

This new you that’s spendin’ a quiet afternoon
shoppin’ with her kids...she’ll make ’em much
happier.

Guzma! What is wrong with you?! You’re turnin’
into a pile of mush...

See ya, Madam Prez. Next time, let’s have a
Pokémon battle or somethin’.

(It seems I’m not the only one who’s changed,
Guzma...)
All right, let’s leave it there for today.
Thank you so much! I feel like I learned a lot!

It’s crazy how much people’s personalities come
through when battling tag team.

You move like you have twin telepathy, Tate and
Liza. It seems like you always know what the
other is gonna do.

In a battle format where teamwork is key, that’s a
huge plus to have.

Lance and Clair, I know that you two
are cousins...

*chuckle*
Aren’t we fantastic?

Compared to Tate and Liza, you two seemed to
move pretty independently of each other.

But that just proves how much you trust each other
and respect each other’s skill.
You don’t need me to tell you how strong you are.
Thanks for the analysis. You’ve got a good eye.

Your coordination with Lillie was really great,
too, Gladion!
It was?

I thought so. It was a little awkward here and
there, but both of you really shined through.

Yeah! And I noticed that when Lillie looked like
she was in trouble, you jumped in and covered
for her.
You really looked like a big brother then!
Wha—
W-well, what else was I supposed to do...
*giggle*

You’re not twins or cousins—you’re siblings.
That relationship is something you can use to
your advantage.
You would do well to utilize it moving forward.
An advantage, huh.

Seems like having a sibling on your team may not
be a bad thing at all.
Yeah! Let’s use it to our advantage!

Come on out, Pheromosa. Our little stroll is over
now. It’s time to go home.
Silvally? Is Gladion around here, too?
Silvally...
I like that name much better than Type: Null.

Gladion, Lillie, and I have become a
family again...

but the mistakes I made in the past haven’t
just disappeared.

You were created for the purpose of fighting the
Ultra Beasts. All that experimentation we put you
through... It must have been terrible.
When you look at me now...
do you hate me for what I did?
Silvally doesn’t hate you.
Gladion...

Silvally’s not the type to dwell on things that
happened in the past.

When it destroyed its control mask, it let go of all
the pain and hatred it felt with it.

Now, Silvally’s focused on the future more than
anything else.
The future...

Yeah. And when it thinks about the future, I’m
sure you and Pheromosa are there right along
with us.
As our allies, fighting right there beside us.
You should try it sometime, too, Mother...
Focusing on the future, I mean.
You’re right...

Rather than dwelling on the past...what I should
be doing is looking ahead at our future.
episode_event_sub_ep_lusamine_family/661:
Wow! I think we did better in this last battle
together than we did during the competition!

I agree. Our team coordination has improved
quite a bit.
Is something the matter, Gladion?

Just thinking about something that’s been nagging
at me...

You and Pheromosa basically have limitless
potential when it comes to your strength. Who
really knows what you’re capable of?

Any way you look at it, you two are a lot stronger
than Silvally and me...

*chuckle*
Stop, Gladion. You’re making us blush.

I don’t plan on leaving it that way, Mother. I’ll
show you that Silvally and I can become stronger
than any other sync pair!
Because...I want to protect you and Lillie.
I want to protect my family.
Gladion...
I’m going to do my best, too!

I’m going to work hard to hone my skills as a
Trainer. Someday, I’ll be even stronger than you
and Mother!
Like Hapu says—no one can call me lily-livered!
Lillie...

*chuckle*
It makes me so proud seeing how confident the
two of you have become...

but you’re still a long, long way from surpassing
me, my dears.

My strength in battle comes from the deep love
that I have for my Pokémon.

Hmph. That sounds like a challenge. Let’s see
which one of us can become the strongest!
We may be family...
but we’re rivals, too!
